news.title: Evergrande offers sweetener for debt revamp as China property crisis worsens
news.para: Evergrande's restructuring proposal, which was thin in details, comes as China's property sector, a key pillar for the world's second-largest economy, lurches from one crisis to another. The sector has seen a string of debt defaults by cash-squeezed developers.

news.title: Form panel for building fire safety norms by Aug 19: HC tells Maharashtra government
news.para: Frowning on the MVA government for issuing 400 government resolutions, the court said, "But a simple committee could not be constituted when lives of people are at stake."

news.title: AAI to start granting height NOCs for buildings near Navi Mumbai airport: CIDCO
news.para: The NOCs will be granted for buildings with planned elevation of more than 55.10m AMSL and up to the elevation of 160.10m AMSL based on the obstacle limitation surface (OLS) criteria as per DGCA guidelines, for projects located within 20 km radius of the proposed Navi Mumbai International Airport (NMIA), the official said.

news.title: Mumbai: Railway to hand over land for Dharavi redevelopment plan
news.para: Shewale said, "Rs 800 crore was also given to the railways on behalf of the state government for the land. However, the Dharavi Redevelopment Project got stuck because the land was not handed over to the state."

news.title: About 46 lakh sq ft of IT space created since 2016: Kerala CM
news.para: Infopark Kochi has new facilities for 10 offices in an area of approximately 35,000 square feet. The new facilities at Infopark Kochi and Thrissur span over 1,60,000 square feet. A total of 1,000 jobs are planned in 17 offices.

news.title: Owners missing from many flats, finds survey of Chandigarh housing board
news.para: The CHB had last week formed 10 teams that had inspected 576 flats. At many flats, original owners were missing; in some cases occupants were unable to give satisfactory replies and some were seen contacting owners on mobile phones, according to sources.

news.title: HC directs collector to indicate steps for demolition of 48 obstacles near Mumbai airport
news.para: These structures were among 137 identified in a 2010-11 obstacle survey by Mumbai International Airport Limited, the airport operator.

news.title: Ahmedabad civic body announces interest rebate on property tax
news.para: Vakil said that the rebate scheme will begin from August 8 and tax payers will be able to avail benefit till October 21. “The scheme is not applicable for 2022-23 and it will be applicable to full payment of tax,” Vakil said.

news.title: Property tax benefit meant only for rehabilitation colonies, clarifies Chandigarh administration
news.para: It has been stated that recent property tax benefits were given to houses in colonies allotted either by the Chandigarh Housing Board (CHB) or Estate Office (EO), but these should be under rehabilitation schemes.

news.title: Building plan approval to go fully digital within two months in Coimbatore
news.para: Moreover, the administrative procedure involved in the approval process is undergoing a slight change. Earlier, only assistant town planning officials and the executive engineer of planning were involved in the process.

news.title: Gujarat HC stays 15-day civil arrest of Rameshwar Developers' partner
news.para: While staying the civil custody of the builder, Rajesh Motiani, a partner in Rameshwar Developers, Justice A S Supehia said that there is no perversity in RERA’s order, but detaining the builder will not serve any purpose.

news.title: Century Plyboards lines up Rs 900 crore capex for capacity expansion
news.para: The company will be investing Rs 543 crore by the end of FY24 towards a greenfield MDF plant in Andhra Pradesh. The company has already invested Rs 57 crore in this plant, bringing the total investment to Rs 600 crore.

news.title: Haryana cabinet approves land pooling policy
news.para: The policy prescribed a timeline to be followed at various stages so the interests of land owners are protected and the objective of land development is achieved in a time-bound manner.

news.title: HSVP comes out with stringent policy for four-storey builder floors in Haryana
news.para: ​Now, an owner or occupant of residential plots wanting to raise four-storey structures will have to ensure that construction does not pose any kind of threat or damage to buildings, especially those sharing common walls.

news.title: Delhi government may soon bring proposal to hike circle rates by up to 30%
news.para: In a recent meeting to review the functioning of the revenue department, the lieutenant governor asked the divisional commissioner to make a detailed presentation on the “revision of circle rates” along with the reports of various working groups constituted for this purpose.
